title: How to Turn a Wii Off

steps.headline: Press and hold the power button on the Wii Remote and your Wii will go into standby mode with Standby Connect on.
steps.description: The light will be orange/yellow. In this mode, WiiConnect24 will be on.

steps.headline: If you want the Wii to be in standby mode with Standby Connect off, then press and hold the power button on the console until the light is red.
steps.description: In this mode, WiiConnect24 will be off.

steps.headline: If you want the Wii to be completely off (no power at all), disconnect the plug connecting the Wii to the plug socket.

tyn: AA batteries for the Wii Remote
